{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=D7000 |revision=-100NAS |asin=B0111MRL4S |price=279.99 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/26/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=dsl modem, wireless router |fcc_id=PY315200306 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63138 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1900 WiFi VDSL/ADSL Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7000.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=D7000}} ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.kitz.co.uk/index.php/topic,15601.0.html ''Netgear D7000'' on '''Kitz''' forums] *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/archive/index.php/t-2631463.html ''Netgear D7000'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Broadband-Carrier-Access/xDSL-CPE-Solutions/BCM63138 BCM63138] @1GHz (DualCore ARM Cortex A9) :Multiple high-end WAN connectivity options, adding ''G.fast'' to ADSL/VDSL, :''Gigabit Ethernet'' and enhanced interfaces for LTE fixed-wireless modems. :Supports Gigabit dual-band concurrent Wi-Fi, multiport Gigabit Ethernet and :multiline VoIP. ''1 GHz dual-core ARM Cortex A9'' processor plus additional :offload engines and dedicated routing accelerator. {{see also|Netgear R7000|Actiontec R3000}} ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|serial info |
